name: Police Drift Chase Real Asphalt Racing Simulator
name_original: Police Drift Chase Real Asphalt Racing Simulator
description:
Cruise down the streets in the city with your sweet exotic ride while avoiding the traffic and cops! Speed by the tanks and helicopters and unlock new hot rides to add to your collection! Download now and let's play!

[How to Play]
• Drive the car using your fingers to swipe
• Collect coins to unlock new cars
• Avoid obstacles in your way
• Play against your friends! Beat their scores!

Download Police Drift Chase Real Racing Thumb Car Simulator now!
